description:
crypto/openpgp: truncate hashes before checking DSA signatures.

I didn't believe that OpenPGP allowed > SHA-1 with DSA, but it does and
so we need to perform hash truncation.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=099a872ab835 ***

crypto/openpgp: truncate hashes before checking DSA signatures.

I didn't believe that OpenPGP allowed > SHA-1 with DSA, but it does and
so we need to perform hash truncation.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5510044

subject: code review 5510044: crypto/openpgp: truncate hashes before checking DSA sig...
